attributes.action: Cuts to the Police, No. Cuts to the Military. No. Cuts to Politicians pay,  YES!
attributes.additional_details:
I feel that it is ridiculous that you (yes YOU) are actively considering cutting the Police and the Armed Forces to save money whilst MP's and council (yes you) members are being payed HUGE sums of money to do nothing more than justify your own jobs.
To be honest I don't care if anybody else ever reads this. So long as somebody "up there" in Lala land does and has a few sleepless nights then, I am happy.
To surmise, Take a bloody pay cut yourselves for a change. See how it feels from this side!
